feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for New Zealand issued by MetService
feed.rights: Copyright Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited, 2025. Licensed under Creative Commons BY 4.0.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 90 to 130 mm of rain. Peaks rates of 15 to 25 mm/h, but 25 to 40 mm/h possible in localised downpours during Tuesday afternoon and evening. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low. Changes: Watch upgraded to an Orange Warning.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 90 to 150 mm of rain, peak rates of 15 to 25 mm/h, but possibly 25 to 40 mm/h in localised downpours from Tuesday afternoon. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low. Changes: Increased Warning duration and rainfall accumulation.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 150 to 200 mm of rain, peak rates of 15 to 25 mm/h, but 25 to 40mm/h possible in localised downpours Tuesday evening until Wednesday morning. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Moderate. Changes: Increased Warning duration and rainfall accumulation.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 80 to 120 mm of rain. Peak rates of 10 to 20 mm/h expected Tuesday evening and Wednesday morning. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low. Changes: Increased rainfall accumulation slightly.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 150 to 180 mm of rain. Intensities may reach 20 to 30 mm per hour. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal. Changes: No significant change.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 130 to 180 mm in a strong northerly flow. Rainfall intensities may reach 15 to 20 mm per hour, especially from mid-morning until early afternoon. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Moderate. Changes: No significant changes.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 70 to 100 mm of rain, especially in the ranges. Rainfall intensities of 15 mm per hour are possible, especially during the afternoon. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Moderate. Changes: No significant changes.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 100 to 130 mm of rain in a strong northerly flow, particularly about the Gordon and Richmond Range, and 70 to 90 mm elsewhere. Rainfall intensities of 15 mm per hour are possible, especially during the afternoon. Impact: Dangerous river conditions, flooding, and slips likely. Dangerous driving conditions and road closures are expected. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: High. Changes: Adjusted wording.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 130 to 180 mm of rain. Rainfall intensities of 20 to 25 mm per hour are possible. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal. Changes: Slight timing change.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 130 to 180 mm of rain about the main divide, and 100 to 130 mm within 15km farther east. Peak rates of 10 to 20 mm/h expected about the divide. Freezing level 2400 m. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal. Changes: No significant changes.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 130 to 180 mm of rain about the main divide, and 80 to 100 mm within 15km farther east. Peak rates of 10 to 20 mm/h expected about the divide. Freezing level 2400 m. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal. Changes: Reduced period by ending Warning earlier.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain and accumulations may approach warning criteria. downpours possible, especially during Tuesday morning and early afternoon. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: Wording change.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain north of Tokomaru Bay, and amounts may approach warning criteria, especially about the ranges. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: High. Changes: No significant changes.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northeast winds may approach severe gale force in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: No significant changes.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northeast winds may approach severe gale force in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: Extended duration of Watch.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northeast winds may approach severe gale force in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: Extended duration of Watch.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northerly winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: Changed timing of Watch.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: North to northeast winds may approach severe gale force in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: No significant changes.
